document.masterDocTitle: New species of the genus Macrogynoplax and new records of Anacroneuria (Plecoptera: Perlidae) from Roraima State, Brazil

Boldrini & I. B. Oliveira ( UFRR )
.
Measurements data. Female forewing length: 12.7–13.0 mm, n= 162; male forewing length: 8.5–9.0 mm, n= 898.
Remarks. This common s pecies has been previously recorded from Amazonas , Espírito Santo , Mato Grosso do Sul and São Paulo states. Here, we presented the first record for Roraima State .
